name: Recruitment of Project Implementing Team in The Bihar State Cooperative Bank Ltd.

details.Terms and Conditions:
An eligible applicant can apply for one or more post.
Selection will be done on contract basis for a period of one year to be continued up to 5 years, which will be based on yearly performance and subject to renewal of contract on yearly basis with break in each extension.
details.Application Fee: The application fee should be submitted through DD in favour of "Managing Director, The Bihar State Cooperative Bank Ltd. Ashok Rajpath, Gandhi Maidan, Patna — 800004, Bihar".
details.Selection Process: The selected candidates will be required to sign the ‘Terms of Assignment’ before joining and on renewal of each term.
details.Contractual Terms: The contractual person, so engaged, shall be required to submit declaration for non-conviction in any court of law. If found, otherwise subsequently, the contractual person shall be summarily dismissed.
